ask_about: a pizza with any size of the following: small, medium, large, extra large
any of the following for toppings: mushrooms, tomato, onion, cheese, olives, pepperoni
response: I'm sorry, but we don't have onions as a topping. We do have cheese, mushrooms, pepper, ham, bacon, pepperoni, olives, corn, and chicken. Could you please choose from these options?
